QuestData.Title: He Will Walk The Earth...
QuestData.Description: Will you do me one last honor, $n? I do not wish to return to Garadar. I believe that my destiny lies elsewhere - that I will serve a greater purpose someday.$B$BPlease, return to Farseer Corhuk and tell him that I will not be returning. That I cannot return. I must walk the earth... He will understand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the news to Farseer Corhuk at Garadar.
QuestData.RewardText: <Farseer Corhuk stares at the ground, lost in contemplation. He nods his head affirmatively.>$B$B<Farseer Corhuk wipes a tear away.>$B$BThe son is the father... May the spirits have mercy on those that stand in his way.
